title: New blocks are not synchronized
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2022.99.99-dev-8c27879a


OS & Version: Linux

Commit hash : 8c27879a6b45b4bc5d21c96e8e0ce475a85a9a48

#### Problem

It seems to be stuck, reaching altitude 7206332 and no longer synchronizing the new block.

#### Backtrace

command: ./erigon --datadir=/mnt/data2/erigon-goerli --chain=goerli --ws --http --http.addr="0.0.0.0" --http.port=18545 --http.corsdomain="*" --http.vhosts="*" --http.api="eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon,admin" --torrent.port=12069 --private.api.addr=:19090 --port=10303

